entries.title: The U.N. is sending Ukrainians aid in crypto. Should it?
entries.description: Amid crypto’s turmoil, UN’s refugee agency is sending US Dollar Coin to refugees for things like rent and heat. It’s sparking concern from crypto skeptics.

entries.title: ‘Marvel Snap’ developer was inspired by friend’s mishap while gaming on the toilet
entries.description: "Marvel Snap's" Ben Brode and Hamilton Chu talk healthy workplace culture, playing games on the toilet and actual second dinners.

entries.title: ‘High on Life’ is more about the jokes than the gameplay
entries.description: "High on Life," from "Rick and Morty's" creator, is a decent action game that's mostly a vehicle for a few too many jokes.

entries.title: Senator seeks FTC probe of data sales to U.S. government agencies
entries.description: Wyden cited a paragraph in the record of the Justice Department’s prosecution of Democratic lawyer Michael Sussmann stipulating that companies associated with a longtime industry entrepreneur had sold browser history data to government agencies.

entries.title: Elon Musk’s role at Tesla questioned as Twitter occupies his attention
entries.description: Some Tesla investors are concerned that Musk is focusing too much on the social media company and becoming more polarizing.
